title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 527 - Taxable Transactions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 527 - Taxable Transactions

State Regulations
§ 527.1 - Sale of tangible personal property
§ 527.2 - Sale of utility and similar services
§ 527.3 - Sale of information services
§ 527.4 - Sale of services of producing, fabricating, processing, printing or imprinting
§ 527.5 - Installing, repairing, servicing and maintaining tangible personal property
§ 527.6 - Storage of tangible personal property
§ 527.7 - Maintaining, servicing or repairing real property
§ 527.8 - Sale of food and drink
§ 527.9 - Hotel occupancy
§ 527.10 - Admission charge
§ 527.11 - Dues
§ 527.12 - Roof garden and cabaret charges
§ 527.13 - Certain energy sources and services
§ 527.14 - Racehorses
§ 527.15 - Certain leases of motor vehicles, vessels and noncommercial aircraft

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 527

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §§171, 1101, 1105, 1110, 1111, 1132, 1142, 1250

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
